name: Who's Behind That Chest?!
description:
Who's Behind That Chest?! is a speed dating show where you get to talk to four different bachelors within a few minutes. But here's the catch... You can only see their chest, nothing else. Only after choosing the chest that you like will their face be revealed!!!

(This is just a short game that I made in a single day since I thought the concept was super funny XD)

Let me know which chest you pick LOL!

- Around 15 minutes playtime

- 5 CGs

Credits to Zapsplat(https://www.zapsplat.com/) for Music and Sound Effects.
